projects.title: A voice for 450+ medical specialists
projects.description: In early 2020, the Dutch national palliative care (IKNL) set out to unify their staff planning and telecommunications under one system. It fell upon me to design and implement this system. The result was a hugely complex but effective system responsible for ‚Ç¨ 500k+ savings and simplifying daily workflows.

projects.title: Championing excellence in architecture
projects.description: My first freelance job saw me working at Selfcare, a company developing a state-of-the-art online medical dossier and revolutionizing Dutch healthcare. Noticing room for improvement, I took charge of a major refactoring effort to bring the core system architecture in line with modern standards.
